fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Target someone to play your twisted game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__ You will always have no defense if this is the case, but your game will act as if you had whatever defense you're supposed to.
- You and your target will spend the night playing a Russian Roulette variation (literally Buckshot Roulette) until someone dies. Your target is blocked from using abilities.
- At the start of each round, you pick how many bullets and of each type are in the chamber, but not the order.
- At the start of the night, your target goes first, not you.
- Both players will always have the Shotgun item.
- Both you and your target have a certain amount of charges depending on how many lives you have left. When being shot by a live shell, you lose a charge. When a player runs out of charges, they lose and die.
- If you lose your game, lose a tier of defense. If on None, you die to yourself.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value: - At the start of every round (when shells are put in the shotgun), both players will draw a certain amount of items, depending on the amount of lives you have. The Shotgun cannot be drawn as an item.

fields.name: Items:
fields.value:
- Shotgun: Shoot yourself or the other player. If you shoot yourself with a blank, take another turn.
- Handcuffs: Skips the other player's next turn. Cannot be stacked.
- Sawblade: Shotgun deals two damage. Lasts for one shell, whether blank or live.
- Magnifying Glass: Learn if the next shell is blank or live.
- Beer: Rack the shotgun, ending the round if it was the last shell.
- Cigarette: Takes the edge off, regaining a charge. You cannot go past the maximum amount of charges.

fields.name: Lives:
fields.value:
- Powerful defense: 2 charges, 0 items drawn.
- Basic defense: 4 charges, 2 items drawn.
- Powerful defense: 4 charges, 4 items drawn. When running out of charges, gain one final charge, but Cigarettes become redundant.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill 3 players in your twisted game.
